name: Skuggi and Artemis
description:
In this little co-op platformer for LuxJam 01 you play the old norse shadow god Skuggi and the greek goddess of moon light, Artemis. Fight your way through various levels while working together! Artemis can  walk through lit areas while Skuggi can traverse the shadows.

CONTROLS:

Skuggi

  • Left: A
  • Right: D
  • Crouch: S
  • Jump: SPACE

Artemis

  • Left: Arrow Left
  • Right: Arrow Right
  • Crouch: Arrow Down
  • Jump: Arrow Up

Restart level: R

Close game: Alt + F4

A game by nostr0 and wabooti

DISCLAIMER

This game was in under 24 hours and it's our first game jam game. 

If you find any bugs or want to leave a comment please do so below :)

Known Bugs:

Last level has an invisible button
